Today, we launched the "Happiness Index" to be the first city in the world to measure the happiness of its residents, visitors and tourists on an interactive daily basis.
Happiness is a project to measure the satisfaction of people and their happiness about the services provided to them immediately and through the system and a smart network ..
At each point of service, the citizen or visitor will choose from an interactive screen and in one touch how satisfied they are with the service

Our goal is to give Dubai residents, visitors and tourists a view of their services on a daily basis because the development of services will contribute to the true happiness and comfort of the people
"Happiness Index" is one of the initiatives of the Dubai Smart City project launched a year ago and will be followed by other initiatives.
I ask from our nationality, do not come to the games of those who want to disturb your peacefulness, destabilize Turkey.
Vandals, as the rapists mix the streets, we will tighten our fraternal ties even more, and we will cling more.
Never take it out of your mind: Turkey is not a country to be plundered by looters, vandals.
Today we launched "Happiness Meter" making Dubai the 1st city in the world to measure its visitors '& residents' happiness interactively.
Happiness Meter delivers an instant measure of people's satisfaction with Dubai's services & facilities through a smart network & system
Our target is to get people's opinion on services on a daily basis, which will have a real impact on people's happiness & comfort levels.
The crisis was not created by Europe. This is a misperception. Speaking at @UNISOBNapoli at "Il Sabato delle idee". http://t.co/nl30LSaDXm
The #EU has shown its extraordinary resilience. Today we are more integrated. Doomsayers were wrong. @UNISOBNapoli
We are not yet out of the crisis. We've solved the issue of stability. We still have to solve the issue of growth and jobs. @UNISOBNapoli
Today there is a problem of ownership. Leaders need to get out of the comfort zone and explain how important Europe is. @UNISOBNapoli
We need a passion for Europe. Europe is the biggest project ever of shared sovereignty. Not lost sovereignty. @UNISOBNapoli
In Europe we often see a nationalisation of success and a Europeanisation of failure. But Europe is not a foreign power! @UNISOBNapoli
We have a EU budget of 1000 billion euros from 2014-2020. For Italy more than 40 billion to invest. @UNISOBNapoli
